bill_title: revise the amount of time allowed for holders of title or  lienholders to reclaim certain abandoned, impounded, or junk motor vehicles.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the amount of time allowed for holders of title or lienholders to reclaim certain abandoned, impounded, or junk motor vehicles. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-36-9 be amended to read as follows: 32-36-9. Notwithstanding any statutes to the contrary, title to any abandoned or junk motor vehicle, any impounded vehicle, or other scrap metal shall vest in the removal agency after a period of thirty ten days from the date on which notice was sent under § 32-36-8. The record holder of title or the lienholder may reclaim the motor vehicle or other scrap metal. The lienholder and record holder of title shall notify the department in writing within thirty ten days of their intent to reclaim the motor vehicle. However, if the record holder of title fails to claim and remove the motor vehicle or other scrap metal within thirty days after mailing of notice, title to the vehicle is irrevocably vested in the removal agency. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the amount of time allowed for holders of title or lienholders to reclaim certain abandoned, impounded, or junk motor vehicles. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-36-9 be amended to read as follows: 32-36-9. Notwithstanding any statutes to the contrary, title to any abandoned , unclaimed, or junk motor vehicle, any impounded vehicle, or other scrap metal shall vest in the removal agency after a period of thirty twenty days from the date on which notice was sent under § 32-36-8. The record holder of title or the lienholder may reclaim the motor vehicle or other scrap metal. The lienholder and record holder of title shall notify the department in writing within thirty twenty days of their intent to reclaim and remove the motor vehicle. However, if the record holder of title fails to claim and remove the motor vehicle or other scrap metal within thirty twenty days after mailing of notice, title to the vehicle is irrevocably vested in the removal agency. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
